post.author: CrimsonHead
post.body: Sad news, the guy's had a huge impact on gaming, even if you're not a big RPG fan like me you can't deny that even some of the FPS games that we love have adopted many RPG elements whose concept can be traced back to the original pen and paper game he created. His legacy lives on and will for many years possibly centuries even.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
The World of Warcraft 2.4.0 week update is dedicated to him by Blizzard.
They talk in the patch description (in the wowtracker, so i can't copy/past) about the awesome inspiration G.G. was for them.

I think the whole heroic fantasy world inspired from the original D&D aswell as from LOTR for exemple.
